full_summary:
### Tender Opportunity: Accessibility Assessment Consultants for Parks Canada

#### Tender Information

* Reference Number: 5P047-21-0068
* Solicitation Number: 5P047-21-0068
* Tender Closing Date: 22 November 2099, 14:00:00
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Supply Arrangement (RFS)

#### Supplier Requirements

Parks Canada Agency invites qualified accessibility consultants to provide a submission of qualification for a Supply Arrangement to complete accessibility assessments in various regions across Canada. The purpose of this agreement is to ensure that Parks Canada places, services, and programs are inclusive to all visitors, in compliance with the Accessible Canada Act (2019).

#### Contract Details

* Contracts resulting from this agreement will vary between $1,000.00 and a maximum of $500,000.00 (inclusive of applicable taxes).
* The Supply Arrangement will remain valid until Canada considers it no longer advantageous to use it.
* The period for awarding contracts under the Supply Arrangement begins once a minimum of three (3) suppliers have been issued a Supply Arrangement.

#### Requirements

* Bidders are expected to have expertise in accessibility assessment and audit services (UNSPSC Code: 84111600).
* Suppliers are required to complete accessibility assessments in various regions across the country, in accordance with the National Parks Regulations and the National Park Act.
* Enquiries regarding this bid must be submitted in writing and should be received no later than five (5) business/calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

#### Instructions to Bidders

* Bids will be accepted electronically only and must be submitted to the following email address: SoumissionSEST-BIDSEAST@pc.gc.ca.
* Emails containing links to bid documents will not be accepted. Bid documents must be sent as email attachments, with a maximum file size of 15 megabytes.
* Late submissions will not be considered.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Additional Information

* Bidders who are interested in submitting a bid for this project must obtain the documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at www.buyandsell.gc.ca/aboutudicots.
* Suppliers who are successful in obtaining a Supply Arrangement will be required to complete a contract proposal document.

Contact Information:
* Bonnie Knott
* Email: bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca
* Telephone: (709)
